oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Picture card tool for holistic planning in organic plant production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fog, Erik
Olesen, Jørgen E.
Noe, Egon
Sørensen, Peter
Melander, Bo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
Technology transfer
Farm nutrient management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Presentation of a new tool for strategic farm planning and improving farm management. The tool is based on picture cards and is meant as an important help for the advisory service for organic farmers. The tool can help the farm manager to raise the yields and the economic performance in organic plant production.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Fog, Erik; Olesen, Jørgen E.; Noe, Egon; Sørensen, Peter and Melander, Bo (2013) Picture card tool for holistic planning in organic plant production. In: Løes, Anne-Kristin; Askegaard, Margrethe; Langer, Vibeke; Partanen, Kirsi; Pehme, Sirli; Rasmussen, Ilse A.; Salomon, Eva; Sørensen, Peter; Ullvén, Karin and Wivstad, Maria (Eds.) Organic farming systems as a driver for change, 9 (3), NJF Report, pp. 153-154.
